title: Standing
context: [ยง414-172] Standing. A shareholder may not commence or maintain a derivative proceeding unless the shareholder: (1) Was a shareholder of the corporation at the time of the act or omission complained of or became a shareholder through transfer by operation of law from one who was a shareholder at that time; and (2) Fairly and adequately represents the interests of the corporation in enforcing the right of the corporation. [L 2000, c 244, pt of ยง1]
